such an unrestrained confident he's the same as always.\""},{"lineNumber":85763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……して、梵天丸。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So, significance.\""},{"lineNumber":85769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すぐにでもここを発つか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall we leave here at once?\""},{"lineNumber":85770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、黒部はどこにいる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, where is Kurobe?\""},{"lineNumber":85771,"originalJapaneseLine":"「地獄に繋がる国、死国」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The country connected to hell, Shikoku.\""},{"lineNumber":85772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今はそこで何をするでもなく暮らしてる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He’s living there now without doing much of anything.\""},{"lineNumber":85773,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、お前ら行くぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, everyone, let’s Shikoku!\""},{"lineNumber":85775,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が死国に向けて、街道を進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others travel along the road toward Shikoku."},{"lineNumber":85776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう、今夜はこちらで宿ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, tonight we'll stay here...\""},{"lineNumber":85777,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、ランス様、どちらに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Lord Rance, where are you off."},{"lineNumber":85784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くところって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Going somewhere...\""},{"lineNumber":85785,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":85786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、ランス様……しくしく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, Lord Rance... sniff sniff...\""},{"lineNumber":85787,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが宿の五十六の部屋の前に止まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance stopped in front of room fifty-six at the inn."},{"lineNumber":85788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐふふ、久しぶりに五十六に再会したのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gufufu, it’s been a while since I met Fifty-six again."},{"lineNumber":85789,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここで一発やらずにどうする……」","translatedEnglishLine":"How could I not have a round here...\""},{"lineNumber":85790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　五十六、約束通り来たぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! Fifty-six, I’ve come as promised!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿では勝てませぬー！×３」
「なんだとー！　失礼なこと言うなー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did you say?! Don't be rude!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな体をくつくつと揺らしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was gently shaking his small body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「上手くいくかは分からんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know if it will go well...
but I have an interesting idea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、目玉は話が通じるじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, that eyeball understands what I'm saying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部殿は俺よりも強いぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kurobe is stronger than me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怠け者で起きたばっかの寝ぼすけ妖怪なんぞ、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can smack away with one hand!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーっはっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
「うう、天衣無縫の自信家さんです……」
「あははー、相変わらずだこの人ー」
本気でこの男の好きにさせる気か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you seriously going to let this man do as he pleases?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下であるランスが自ら会いに出向くのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Leader Rance himself going to meet him

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今はそこで何をするでもなく暮らしてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He’s living there now without doing much of anything."
We’re going to exterminate youkai in Shikoku!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が死国に向けて、街道を進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others travel along the road toward Shikoku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう、今夜はこちらで宿ですね……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Lord Rance, where are you headed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はちょっと行くところがある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have somewhere to go for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは先に寝ていていいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel, you can go to bed early."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが驚く間もなく、
てってけてーとランスは行ってしまった。
ランスが宿の五十六の部屋の前に止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stopped in front of room fifty-six at the inn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐふふ、久しぶりに五十六に再会したのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gufufu, it’s been a while since I met Fifty-six again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで一発やらずにどうする……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How could I not have a round here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　五十六、約束通り来たぞー！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
